member.name: T:Sudoku.CodeGen.DelegatedEquality.Annotations.DelegatedEqualityMethodAttribute
member.summary: Indicates an attribute instance which is marked on a method, to tell the users and the compiler that this method is an equality method to judge whether two instances contain the same value.

member.name: T:Sudoku.CodeGen.DelegatedEquality.AutoEqualityMethodGenerator
member.summary: Indicates a generator that generates the code about the equality method.
